revised_title: Nutrition and Bone Growth: The Role of Vitamin A and Vitamin D in the Nervous System
tldr: The author discusses the importance of vitamins A and D in bone growth and the nervous system. They explain how a deficiency in these vitamins can lead to incoordination and other abnormalities in animals. The author also highlights the amount of vitamin A needed to prevent these abnormalities and examines the lesions in the peripheral and central nervous systems of vitamin A-deficient animals.
